title: Drugs: The Children are choosing - The Need for dialogue
creator_credit: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.) and Joanne M Mock
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Drugs: the children are choosing”.
Reports on a conference in which students and teachers have difficulties in communicating about drugs. Finally the frustrations and problems childhood emerge and it is suggested that it is no wonder young people turn to drugs for escape and pleasure.
